crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY Dropbox.com Offsite File Backup in Use
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls [108.160.162.0/20,162.125.0.0/16,192.189.200.0/23,199.47.216.0/22,205.189.0.0/24,209.99.70.0/24,45.58.64.0/20] 443 -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY Dropbox.com Offsite File Backup in Use"; flow:established,to_client; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN=*.dropbox.com"; fast_pattern; threshold: type limit, count 1, seconds 300, track by_src; reference:url,www.dropbox.com; reference:url,dereknewton.com/2011/04/dropbox-authentication-static-host-ids/; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2012647; rev:7; metadata:created_at 2011_04_07, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_03_25;)

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This signature detects base64 encoded Powershell directives.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

attributes.magic: ASCII text, with very long lines (4322u), with no line terminators

threat_severity.level_description: Severity MEDIUM because it was considered trojan.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects TOKEN OBFUSCATION technique from Invoke-Obfuscation

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -noLogo -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -file "C:\Users\george\Desktop\p.ps1"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -ep bypass -c " Invoke-Expression (Get-Content C:\\ProgramData\\G3892.tmp);"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "-ExecutionPolicy" flag.
Detects signs of potential use of the WSMAN provider from uncommon processes locally and remote execution.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.
